input_text:
Job Title: B2B Partnerships Specialist (no experience required)

Location: Madison, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Consulting, Sales

Description:
At Infinity Business Group, we're more than just about sales â€“ we're about making a meaningful impact. Our mission is to take our Success and turn it into Significance, to take our Blessings and be a Blessing for others, and to passionately pursue exponential and sustainable Growth. As a leading provider of industry-leading supplemental insurance, we're dedicated to enhancing the well-being of individuals and businesses alike.
**Position Overview:**We're looking for a dedicated B2B Partnerships Specialist to join our team and help us fulfill our mission. In this role, you'll play a crucial part in building strategic partnerships with businesses, offering them our innovative supplemental insurance solutions to support their employees' health and well-being.
**Key Responsibilities:**- Identify and cultivate relationships with potential B2B partners within various industries.- Collaborate with partners to understand their specific needs and challenges.- Present our industry-leading supplemental insurance offerings, showcasing their value and benefits.- Work closely with internal teams to ensure seamless implementation and delivery of solutions.- Serve as a trusted advisor to our partners, providing ongoing support and guidance.
**Qualifications:**- Strong passion for making a positive impact and helping others.- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships.- Ability to understand and articulate complex insurance solutions to diverse audiences.- Self-motivated with a results-driven mindset and a desire for continuous growth.-Willing and eager to be out in the community, not behind a desk. If you are looking for a remote position that you can do from within your home, this is NOT the position for you. 95% of our partnerships with clients happen face-to-face, in person (not via computer or phone).- Previous experience in B2B partnerships or sales is preferred but not required.
**Why Join Us:**- Opportunity to be part of a company that's committed to making a difference in people's lives.- Competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and advancement.- Comprehensive training and support to help you succeed in your role.- Collaborative and supportive team environment where your contributions are valued.- If you're passionate about helping businesses thrive while making a meaningful impact, we want you on our team.
If you're ready to turn success into significance and be part of a mission-driven organization, we'd love to hear from you! Submit your resume and join us on our journey to make a difference.
 **We offer:**$70,000 - $120,000+ first year potential and $120-160k within 3 years (100% commission/performance-based income)A clear path for quick advancement within your control (within your first 3 months), not based on politicsCash Bonuses ($250 - $3,000 per month)Stock Bonuses ($2,000 per quarter)Top-tier training and professional development, including a minimum of 5 days of 1-on-1 field training in your area. Initial training is efficient and effective, leading to a fast start for new agents. Additional professional development opportunities are available weekly, monthly, and quarterly at no cost to the agentFlexible full-time schedule; you choose your hours - NO EVENINGS OR WEEKENDS requiredRecognition, awards, and incentives for achievementsVested renewal income (vesting begins after 2 years and builds to 100% vested after 5)Company-paid international travel opportunitiesUnmatched company culture and co-workers
Learn more about us at: https://www.ibgfhl.com/career.html

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: B2B Partnerships Specialist
output_json.summary: Join Infinity Business Group as a B2B Partnerships Specialist to build strategic partnerships and enhance the well-being of businesses through innovative supplemental insurance solutions.

Collaborate with partners to understand their needs and challenges
Work closely with internal teams for seamless implementation
Serve as a trusted advisor, providing ongoing support
Willingness to engage in face-to-face meetings
benefits: Recognition, awards, and incentives for achievements
Vested renewal income (vesting begins after 2 years)
output_json.company_information: Infinity Business Group is a leading provider of industry-leading supplemental insurance, dedicated to enhancing the well-being of individuals and businesses.

Top-tier training and professional development, including a minimum of 5 days of 1-on-1 field training in your area.
Flexible full-time schedule; you choose your hours - NO EVENINGS OR WEEKENDS required
Recognition, awards, and incentives for achievements
